title: All dogs go to heaven
creator_credit: Sullivan Bluth Studios Ireland, Don Bluth, Gary Goldman and John Pomeroy
brief_description: Don Bluth, the acclaimed animator of “An American Tail” transports us into a wonderful world of animals and adventure. Featuring the voices of Burt Reynolds, Dom DeLuise and Loni Anderson. Charlie is a rascal but a hero nevertheless. This canine rogue’s michievious streak gets him into serious trouble until he learns the value of friendship and goodness.
